channel.title: [PI] Destroy item dialogue at chosen items

item.title: [PI] Destroy item dialogue at chosen items
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:6, topic:520813”][quote author=funyou link=topic=639324.msg4322931#msg4322931 date=1372441733]
How could you do this with EVERY item in-game instead of typing out each item’s ID?
[/quote]using the cache[/quote]
No, not at all. You could simply change this:

boolean destroy = true; for (int i : Config.DESTROY_ITEMS) { if (i == itemId) { c.droppedItem = itemId; c.getPA().destroyInterface(itemId); return; } }

to this:

boolean destroy = true; c.droppedItem = itemId; c.getPA().destroyInterface(itemId); return;

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Destroy item dialogue at chosen items

item.title: [PI] Destroy item dialogue at chosen items
item.dc:creator: @remcowp remcowp
item.description:
@remcowp wrote:

No problem, hope u enjoy it.

Also people have been asking me: If you die with Fire-Cape and u added it to the Destroy array you drop the firecape on the death.
No worries, just add the Firecape to Un droppable items and its all okay

:rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Destroy item dialogue at chosen items
item.dc:creator: @remcowp remcowp
item.description:
@remcowp wrote:

Hello Mopar.

This is my second tutorial and im again not a 100% sure but i could not find this anywhere.

Difficulty: 1\10, Copying and Pasting.

So what does this do?: This gives u a dialogue when u are dropping items that you have chosen to be. Example: FireCape. This gives u a dialogue saying: Are you sure you wanna drop this item with a Yes & No button.
if clicking Yes, the item dissapears so it doesnt drop on the ground. I know u can just make an item Undropable but i didnt like that ^^.

Lets get started.

Step 1, adding the “destroyInterface” method to the class: Playerassistant

	public void destroyInterface(int itemId) {//Destroy item created by Remco
		itemId = c.droppedItem;//The item u are dropping
		String itemName = c.getItems().getItemName(c.droppedItem);
		String[][] info = {//The info the dialogue gives
				{ "Are you sure you want to drop this item?", "14174" },
				{ "Yes.", "14175" }, { "No.", "14176" }, { "", "14177" },
				{ "This item is valuable, you will not", "14182" }, { "get it back once clicked Yes.", "14183" },
				{ itemName, "14184" } };
		sendFrame34(itemId, 0, 14171, 1);
		for (int i = 0; i < info.length; i++)
			sendFrame126(info[i][0], Integer.parseInt(info[i][1]));
		sendFrame164(14170);
	}

Step 2, adding “destroyItem” if you didnt have it, still in Playerassistant class.

	public void destroyItem(int itemId) {
		itemId = c.droppedItem;
		String itemName = c.getItems().getItemName(itemId);
		c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId,c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemId), c.playerItemsN[c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemId)]);
		c.sendMessage("Your " + itemName
				+ " vanishes as you drop it on the ground.");
		removeAllWindows();
	}

Step 3, adding the boolean u can add your items in and gets called when dropping the item. Class: Config

Search for: public static final int[] UNDROPPABLE_ITEMS

Under it add: [QUOTE]public static final int[] DESTROY_ITEMS = {6570};//You can add more items here.[/QUOTE]

Step 4, making the buttons Yes & No work. Class: Clickingbuttons.

			case 55096://This is the button id
			c.getPA().removeAllWindows();//Choosing No will remove all the windows
                        c.droppedItem = -1;
			break;
			
			case 55095://This is the button id
			c.getPA().destroyItem(c.droppedItem);//Choosing Yes will delete the item and make it dissapear
                        c.droppedItem = -1;
			break;

Final step, 5. Adding it to the Dropitem class.

		boolean destroy = true;
		for (int i : Config.DESTROY_ITEMS) {
		if (i == itemId) {
				c.droppedItem = itemId;
				c.getPA().destroyInterface(itemId);
				return;
				}
		}

Step 6, Player class add:

Finished, you should now have it completely done, test it by dropping a FireCape, ItemID: 6570

Any problems/error’s please reply.
Did you add this to your server? Give me a Thanks, if you really liked it give me a Rep

Thanks ^^, Remco

Read full topic
